HomePage.title: Telos: Intelligent Workflow Orchestration Platform
HomePage.subtitle: Modern, scalable intelligent workflow orchestration platform
HomePage.description: Supports automated task scheduling and management, adopts frontend-backend separation and microservices architecture, suitable for enterprise-level automation scenarios

features.title: Core Features
features.frontend: Frontend based on Next.js 15 + Shadcn UI for a smooth experience
features.backend: Backend Go microservices for high performance and easy scalability
features.communication: Supports tRPC/gRPC for type-safe and efficient inter-service communication
features.monorepo: Monorepo management for unified dependencies and easy collaboration

frontend.title: Frontend Tech Stack
frontend.nextjs: Next.js 15 - Uses App Router for server components and optimized routing
frontend.shadcn: Shadcn UI - Component library based on Tailwind CSS for rapid responsive UI development
frontend.typescript: TypeScript - Strongly typed language for code stability and maintainability
frontend.trpc: tRPC - Type-safe API calls between frontend and backend
frontend.zustand: Zustand - Lightweight state management for complex interactions

backend.title: Backend Tech Stack
backend.go: Go - High performance, native concurrency, ideal for microservices
backend.gin: Gin/Echo - Lightweight HTTP frameworks for rapid API development
backend.grpc: gRPC - High-performance RPC framework based on Protobuf for inter-service communication
backend.postgresql: PostgreSQL - Relational database for structured data
backend.redis: Redis - Cache database for fast data access and task queueing

infrastructure.title: Infrastructure
infrastructure.docker: Docker - Containerized deployment for environment consistency
infrastructure.kubernetes: Kubernetes - Cluster orchestration for automated deployment and scaling
infrastructure.helm: Helm - K8s package manager for simplified deployment
infrastructure.tracing: Jaeger - Distributed tracing for service call chain analysis
